rvinecopulib 0.5.0.1.0

Plotting R-vine structures

plot.rvine_structure.Rd

Plot one or all trees of an R-vine structure.

# S3 method for rvine_structure
plot(x, tree = 1, edge_labels = FALSE, ...)

# S3 method for rvine_matrix
plot(x, tree = 1, edge_labels = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

x

an rvine_structure or rvine_matrixc object.
tree

"ALL" or integer vector; specifies which trees are plotted.
edge_labels

either TRUE or FALSE; if TRUE the edge index is added to the plot.
...

unused.

Examples

plot(cvine_structure(1:5))
#> Error in cvine_structure(1:5): could not find function "cvine_structure"
plot(rvine_structure_sim(5))
#> Error in rvine_structure_sim(5): could not find function "rvine_structure_sim"
mat <- rbind(c(1, 1, 1), c(2, 2, 0), c(3, 0, 0))
plot(rvine_matrix(mat))
plot(rvine_matrix_sim(5))
#> Error in rvine_matrix_sim(5): could not find function "rvine_matrix_sim"
